normalised: social media and influencer marketing news

unnormalised: **Follower Analytics: Are Your Insta Peeps Real, Yaar?**
normalised: follower analytics: are your insta peeps real, yaar?

unnormalised: Mumbai – Feeling like your Instagram numbers are looking a little… inflated? You're not alone! New follower analytics tools are hitting the market, promising to sniff out those pesky bots and ghost followers quicker than you can say "biryani."
normalised: mumbai – feeling like your instagram numbers are looking a little… inflated? you are not alone! new follower analytics tools are hitting the market, promising to sniff out those pesky bots and ghost followers quicker than you can say "biryani."

unnormalised: Think of it like this: all that effort you’re putting into crafting the perfect Onam-themed reel might be wasted if half your audience is just fake accounts. These analytics platforms are helping influencers like Priya Sharma from Delhi understand who's *really* engaging with their content.
normalised: think of it like this: all that effort you are putting into crafting the perfect onam-themed reel might be wasted if half your audience is just fake accounts. these analytics platforms are helping influencers like priya sharma from delhi understand who is really engaging with their content.

unnormalised: We're talking detailed insights into follower demographics, activity patterns, and even identifying accounts likely to be spam. Some reports are even flagging accounts from suspiciously generic IP addresses.
normalised: we are talking detailed insights into follower demographics, activity patterns, and even identifying accounts likely to be spam. some reports are even flagging accounts from suspiciously generic I P addresses.

unnormalised: So, before you spend all your Diwali bonus on fancy collaborations, maybe invest in some follower hygiene. It could save you some serious Rs. and embarrassment down the line. Real engagement is the new gold, folks! Plus, knowing your real audience means you can finally ditch the generic content and start creating stuff that *actually* resonates with them. Think of it as the "Aadhar card" for your Insta following!
normalised: so, before you spend all your diwali bonus on fancy collaborations, maybe invest in some follower hygiene. it could save you some serious rupees and embarrassment down the line. real engagement is the new gold, folks! plus, knowing your real audience means you can finally ditch the generic content and start creating stuff that actually resonates with them. think of it as the "aadhar card" for your insta following!
